nodes.text: Bellboy was a Heavy Lifter in the Imperial Navy used by the Imperial-class Star Destroyer Tormentor.

Bellboy was in the process of bringing in twelve Class-A cargo containers when Rebel X-wings from Red Squadron and Y-wings from Gold Squadron arrived to destroy the capital ship. The Tormentor had a complement of TIE Advanced fighters to defend the starship. Bellboy attempted to return to the Star Destroyer's hanger for protection against the Rebels.

The outcome of the battle depends on what side the player has chosen in the video game X-Wing vs. TIE Fighter. Bellboy is listed as a bonus objective to be destroyed, should the player choses the Rebellion, or to be defended if the player is Imperial.
